com.group.project

Class aeCalenderDatabaseHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      • com.group.project.aeCalenderDatabaseHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class aeCalenderDatabaseHelper
extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
    A helper class to create and interact with the database

      • addEvent

        public static long addEvent(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db,
                            java.lang.String name,
                            int semesterId,
                            java.lang.String date,
                            java.lang.String time,
                            java.lang.String endDate,
                            java.lang.String endTime,
                            int typeId,
                            int classId,
                            java.lang.String desc,
                            boolean repeat,
                            int currentSteps,
                            int totalSteps,
                            int notificationId)
        Add a new event to the Database
        Parameters:
        db - The db to add the event to
        name - The name of the event
        semesterId - The id of the semester the event is in
        date - The start date of the event
        time - The start time of the event
        endDate - The end date of the event
        endTime - The end time of the event
        typeId - The id of the type the event is associated with
        classId - The id of the class the event is associated with
        desc - The description of the event
        repeat - does the event repeat weekly
        currentSteps - how many steps is the event at
        totalSteps - whats the total steps the event has
        notificationId - the id of the notification for the event
        Returns:
        The id from the database of the created event

                               long typeId)
        Updates an event in the database
        Parameters:
        db - The db that the event is in
        id - The id of the event to update
        event - The updated event

      • addClass

        public static long addClass(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db,
                            java.lang.String name,
                            java.lang.String location,
                            int semesterId,
                            java.lang.String dates,
                            java.lang.String startTime,
                            java.lang.String endTime)
        Adds a new class the the database
        Parameters:
        db - The db to add the class to
        name - The name of the class
        location - The location of the class
        semesterId - The id of the semester associated with the class
        dates - The string of dates the class is on, separated by spaces, eg (MON TUE ...)
        startTime - The start time of the class
        endTime - The end time of the class
        Returns:
        The id of the created class

        public static void removeClass(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db,
                               long id)
        Removes a class from the database
        Parameters:
        db - The db to remove the class from
        id - The id of the class to remove

      • getEvents

        public static void getEvents(aeCalenderDatabaseHelper.ExecGetEvents.AsyncResponseEvent resultClass,
                             android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db,
                             java.lang.String date)
        Gets the events on the given date The results are returned in the processFinish function in the AsyncResponseEvent interface
        Parameters:
        resultClass - The class that will get the response, Must implement AsyncResponseEvent
        db - The db to get the events from
        date - The date to filter by, can be null
        See Also:
        aeCalenderDatabaseHelper.ExecGetEvents.AsyncResponseEvent

      • getClasses

        public static void getClasses(aeCalenderDatabaseHelper.ExecGetClasses.AsyncResponseClass resultClass,
                              android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db,
                              int semesterId)
        Gets the classes for a specific semester The results are returned in the processFinish function in the AsyncResponseClass interface
        Parameters:
        resultClass - The class that will get the response, Must implement AsyncResponseClass
        db - The db to get the class from
        semesterId - The semester to filter by
